item.title: Linux rootkit implementation
item.description: Linux rootkit implementation Sunday, December 4, 2011 This is a rootkit i developed some time ago for educational purposes. It has the ability to hide itself from lsmod, hide processes, tcp connections, logged in users and to give uid 0 to any running process. The rootkit does not work on linux kernel >= 3.0; I′ve successfully tested it on kernels >= 2.6.26 && <= 2.6.38. The hiding
